definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: For details, please visit the Tax Concession Scheme website.
sentences.chinese: 詳情請瀏覽稅務寬減計劃網頁。

sentences.english: The money is in an authorized fund and tax will be reduced.
sentences.chinese: 這筆款項放在認可基金內，稅款能獲寬減。

sentences.english: Donation over HK$100 is tax deductible with of_f_icial receipts.
sentences.chinese: 奉獻滿港幣壹佰圓或以上，憑奉獻收據可獲稅務寬減。
